markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Violent Vines](/Feats.aspx?ID=3960) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ghoran" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=352" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 39</row>

</column>

---

When angered, you can imbue nearby vines with your wrath, provoking them into a murderous rampage. Once per hour, you can cast [_murderous vine_](/Spells.aspx?ID=953) as a primal innate spell.
name: Violent Vines
